name: Hawkmoon
flavor_text: Stalk thy prey and let loose thy talons upon the Darkness.

frame.name: Paracausal Shot
frame.description: Final blows and precision hits with Hawkmoon grant stacks of Paracausal Charge. The final round in the magazine deals bonus damage based on the number of stacks. Stowing Hawkmoon on the final round removes this bonus.
